item.description:
The last two Comedy Night MeetUps at The Pearl have been great with between 20 and 30 of us in attendance! Our presents is steadily growing. Hey, maybe we'll soon take over the place!

Now this show stars Frank Santorelli and Mitch Stinson.

Santorelli is a regular performer in Las Vegas, has been seen on Comedy Central, Showtime and he was Georgie the bartender on the HBO series the Sopranos.  Santorelli has headlined at some of the world's most famous comedy clubs including Comic Strip, Catch a Rising Star, the Comedy Cellar, and Caroline’s, all in New York City as well as the Laugh Factory and The Improv in Los Angeles. He had a starring role in the film “The Godfathers of Comedy.” Santorelli has appeared in numerous movies including “No Reservations,” “Meet the Parents,” and “Crooked Lines,” as well as having been seen in many television shows including “Law and Order.”

Mitch Stinson is a Boston headliner and favorite who was voted Rhode Island's Funniest Comic.

Tickets are $15 and may be purchased in advance through Pay Pal via the Pearl website (www.portsmouthpearl.com) or $15 cash the night of the show.

Get there between 7:30 - 7:45 pm and look for a Portsmouth & Beyond meetup sign on the table.

See you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Be there around 7:30pm, Look for a Portsmouth & Beyond MEETUP sign on the table

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: A COMEDY NIGHT @ PORTSMOUTH PEARL
